# string(from:)

**Instance Method**

Creates and returns a localized string representation of the provided measurement.

## Declaration

```swift
func string<UnitType>(from measurement: Measurement<UnitType>) -> String where UnitType : Unit
```

## Parameters

- **measurement**: The measurement to be represented.

## Return Value

A user-readable string that represents the measurement.

## Converting Measurements

- **string(from:)**: Creates and returns a localized string representation of the provided measurement.
- **string(from:)**: Creates and returns a localized string representation of the provided unit of measure.

items.description: Creates and returns a localized string representation of the provided measurement.
